messages.message: I've been seeing a common theme in showing AIHub to different people today.  They play around with converse and send me a screenshots of it not really working for any of their some what more complicated queries, often time converse just saying it can't do that.  Once I tell them to try Advanced Mode, everything they are trying to do works wonderfully and they are very impressed.  I don't think they would have figured out that there's an Advanced mode without me telling them. I think Advanced Mode needs to be more easily discoverable when things aren't working well in Default mode.

+1 to discoverability.
I remember finding it by accident too.
Maybe add a border to the dropdown list to make it more like a button
Or maybe if we can detect a default query response isn’t very good, we can add a “Try in Advanced Mode?”  prompt
^ try in advance mode prompt is a great idea
